00002 //! \file *********************************************************************
00003 //!
00004 //! \brief This file contains the Power Management low level driver definition
00005 //!
00006 //!  This module allows to configure the different power mode of the AVR core and
00007 //!  also to setup the the internal clock prescaler
00008 //!
00009 //! - Compiler:           IAR EWAVR and GNU GCC for AVR
00010 //! - Supported devices:  AT90USB1287, AT90USB1286, AT90USB647, AT90USB646
00011 //!
00012 //! \author               Atmel Corporation: http://www.atmel.com \n
00013 //!                       Support and FAQ: http://support.atmel.no/
00014 //!
00015 //! ***************************************************************************
00016

00045 #ifndef _POWER_DRV_H_
00046 #define _POWER_DRV_H_
00047 
00048 #ifdef  __GNUC__
00049    #include <avr/power.h>
00050 #endif
00051 //! @defgroup powermode Power management drivers
00052 //!
00053 //! @{
00054    
00055 //_____ M A C R O S ________________________________________________________
00056 
00057 #define Setup_idle_mode()                       (SMCR=0,SMCR |= (1<<SE))
00058 #define Setup_power_down_mode()                 (SMCR=0,SMCR |= (1<<SE)+(1<<SM1))
00059 #define Setup_adc_noise_reduction_mode()        (SMCR=0,SMCR |= (1<<SE)+(1<<SM0))
00060 #define Setup_power_save_mode()                 (SMCR=0,SMCR |= (1<<SE)+(1<<SM1)+(1<<SM0))
00061 #define Setup_standby_mode()                    (SMCR=0,SMCR |= (1<<SE)+(1<<SM2)+(1<<SM1))
00062 #define Setup_ext_standby_mode()                (SMCR=0,SMCR |= (1<<SE)+(1<<SM2)+(1<<SM1)+(1<<SM0))
00063 
00064 //! Clear_prescaler.
00065 //!
00066 //! This function reset the internal CPU core clock prescaler
00067 //!
00068 //!
00069 //! @param none
00070 //!
00071 //! @return none.
00072 //!
00073 #ifdef  __GNUC__
00074    #define Clear_prescaler()                       (clock_prescale_set(0))
00075 #else
00076    #define Clear_prescaler()                       (Set_cpu_prescaler(0))
00077 #endif
00078 
00079 //! Set_prescaler.
00080 //!
00081 //! This function configure the internal CPU core clock prescaler value
00082 //!
00083 //!
00084 //! @param x: prescaler new value
00085 //!
00086 //! @return none.
00087 //!
00088 #ifdef  __GNUC__
00089    #define Set_cpu_prescaler(x)                        (clock_prescale_set(x))
00090 #else
00091    extern void Set_cpu_prescaler(U8 x);
00092 #endif
00093 
00094 
00095 #define Sleep_instruction()      {asm("SLEEP");}
00096 
00097 //Backward compatibility
00098 #define Set_power_down_mode()      set_power_down_mode()
00099 #define Set_idle_mode()            set_idle_mode()
00100 
00101 //_____ D E C L A R A T I O N ______________________________________________
00102 
00103 void set_idle_mode(void);
00104 void set_power_down_mode(void);
00105 void set_adc_noise_reduction_mode(void);
00106 void set_power_save_mode(void);
00107 void set_standby_mode(void);
00108 void set_ext_standby_mode(void);
00109 
00110 //! Enter_idle_mode.
00111 //!
00112 //! This function makes the AVR core enter idle mode.
00113 //!
00114 //! @param none
00115 //!
00116 //! @return none.
00117 //!
00118 #define Enter_idle_mode()                 (set_idle_mode())
00119 
00120 //! Enter_power_down_mode.
00121 //!
00122 //! This function makes the AVR core enter power down mode.
00123 //!
00124 //! @param none
00125 //!
00126 //! @return none.
00127 //!
00128 #define Enter_power_down_mode()           (set_power_down_mode())
00129 
00130 //! Enter_adc_noise_reduction_mode.
00131 //!
00132 //! This function makes the AVR core enter adc noise reduction mode.
00133 //!
00134 //! @param none
00135 //!
00136 //! @return none.
00137 //!
00138 #define Enter_adc_noise_reduction_mode()  (set_adc_noise_reduction_mode())
00139 
00140 //! Enter_power_save_mode.
00141 //!
00142 //! This function makes the AVR core enter power save mode.
00143 //!
00144 //! @param none
00145 //!
00146 //! @return none.
00147 //!
00148 #define Enter_power_save_mode()           (set_power_save_mode())
00149 
00150 //! Enter_standby_mode.
00151 //!
00152 //! This function makes the AVR core enter standby mode.
00153 //!
00154 //! @param none
00155 //!
00156 //! @return none.
00157 //!
00158 #define Enter_standby_mode()              (set_standby_mode())
00159 
00160 //! Enter_ext_standby_mode.
00161 //!
00162 //! This function makes the AVR core enter extended standby mode.
00163 //!
00164 //! @param none
00165 //!
00166 //! @return none.
00167 //!
00168 #define Enter_ext_standby_mode()          (set_ext_standby_mode())
00169 
00170 
00171 //! @}
00172 
00173 #endif  // _POWER_DRV_H_
